content: the kaleidoscope blanket has a unique crochet blanket construction where triangles are crocheted into squares which are then seamed together to form the kaleidoscope chunky crochet blanket pattern perfectly reversible this 4 color crochet blanket is great for beginners looking to branch out from classic blanket constructions shop more chunky crochet blanket patterns - esme waffle blanket https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/esme-waffle-crochet-blanket - brunch blanket https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/brunch-blanket - impressionist blanket https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/impressionist-blanket *buy 2 or more patterns get 30% off your entire order use code bundle30 at checkout* /pattern details unique crochet blanket construction 4 color blanket size 125 cm / 49 by 180 cm / 71 beginner friendly made out of squares sewed together 100% reversible techniques used / special stitches full explanations are given in the pattern us crochet notations illustrated step-by-step photos /materials 7 mm / us k 10 5 hook zeeman julia bulky weight 5 80% acrylic 20% wool 170m/186yd 100g/3 5oz o 6 skeins in light blue a o 3 skeins in each of rust b hunter green c and mustard colors d tapestry needle to weave in the ends get your very convenient yarn jargon cheatsheets for free by joining my email list here https //pages knittingwithchopsticks com/cheatsheets ⋙ follow me on instagram @knittingwithchopsticks ⋘
